title: when will Warring kingdom azir be available again?
body: So when will they make Warring kingdom Azir available again? Because it's the only skin left that I really want so if anyone knows the next date or event please let me know.

replies.body: It won't be avilable until the next lunar revel. The event that celebrates the zodiac new year. So you will have to wait until 2018 unless you het lucky and get it in a chest.
but the skin will be available in store?
Yes, around the chinese new year 2018, so about 4-5 months
Wow, I came here expecting to be able to get it, but nope, another 6 months too late.
